snippet: Florida Coach Will Muschamp denounced critics who questioned his decision to reinstate three players suspended for a game that ended up being called off after the opening kickoff because of lightning.
abstract: Florida football coach Will Muschamp denounces critics who are questioning his decision to reinstate three players suspended for game that ended up being called off after opening kickoff because of lightning.
lead_paragraph: Florida Coach Will Muschamp denounced critics who questioned his decision to reinstate three players suspended for a game that ended up being called off after the opening kickoff because of lightning.
